title: ICE and the Unfolding Immigration Tragedy
description:
Le贸n Krauze jumps into the host chair for the day to chat with The Atlantic's Frank Foer about his cover story on ICE, the fear in immigrant communities, and what to make of the Paul Manafort fiasco at the end of this week.
Plus, John Di Domenico returns with more tweets.
